# Frequently Asked Questions

[ When was Precipio, Inc. founded? ](#accordion-item-when-was-precipio,-inc.-founded?)

Precipio, Inc. was founded in 2017 as a result of the merger with Transgenomic, Inc.

[ Where is your corporate headquarters located? ](#accordion-item-where-is-your-corporate-headquarters-located?)

Our corporate headquarters are located at 4 Science Park, New Haven, CT 06511.

[ Is Precipio, Inc. a public company? ](#accordion-item-is-precipio,-inc.-a-public-company?)

Yes. Precipio, Inc. is a public company traded on the NASDAQ CM under the symbol PRPO.

[ What is Precipio, Inc.’s Cusip number? ](#accordion-item-what-is-precipio,-inc.’s-cusip-number?)

The Cusip for Precipio, Inc. 74019L602.

[ How can I buy Precipio, Inc. stock? ](#accordion-item-how-can-i-buy-precipio,-inc.-stock?)

Please contact a licensed stockbroker or use an online trading account. You can also contact us for additional information.

[ What is the fiscal year for Precipio, Inc.? ](#accordion-item-what-is-the-fiscal-year-for-precipio,-inc.?)

Our fiscal year ends on December 31st.

[ How do I contact Precipio, Inc. Investor Relations department? ](#accordion-item-how-do-i-contact-precipio,-inc.-investor-relations-department?)

Please contact: Precipio Inc., 4 Science Park, New Haven, CT 06511. investors@precipiodx.com [1.203.787.7888](tel:12037877888)
